add.description: Empty cart state must trigger specific UI redirection ('continue shopping' link).

add.description: GET /api/v1/cart endpoint must return individual subtotals and cart total.
add.reason: LLD Cart Service does not explicitly document the API response structure for GET /api/v1/cart to include individual subtotals and cart total.

add.description: POST /api/v1/cart/items must default quantity to 1 if not specified.
add.reason: LLD Cart Service does not specify default quantity behavior for POST /api/v1/cart/items.

modify.current_state: addItem validates product availability and adds item to cart, but does not enforce default quantity or UI redirection for empty cart.

modify.reason: Required for alignment with story acceptance criteria and business logic.
